import data from '../data' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min' export default function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id) return (
Back to result

  • Description: {product.description}
